title: VanwaTech
author: VanwaTech
created_time: January 01, 2023, 10:55:31 PMLast edit: January 02, 2023, 03:28:57 PM by VanwaTech
content: We are giving out free IPv6-only VPS for the New Year!Get yours now! https://billing.vanwa.tech/index.php?rp=/store/memory-optimized-kvm-vps/free-ipv6-only-vps*Shared CPU Core*500MB Dedicated RAM*20GB RAID 5 SSD*1 IPv6 IP Address*10Mb/s Unmetered BandwidthUse our free CDN to make your web services available over both IPv4 and IPv6 as well!https://cdn.vanwa.tech/Enjoy

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Hi, why do you offer free Ip6 and not Ip4? And for how long is it? This should be named free trial, that sounds nicer, also shared cpu, 500MB ram is not enough.

comments.author: VanwaTech
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on January 04, 2023, 06:16:16 PMHi, why do you offer free Ip6 and not Ip4? And for how long is it? This should be named free trial, that sounds nicer, also shared cpu, 500MB ram is not enough.It's forever, that's why it's not called a free trial. It's just a free service.We only offer IPv4 and more RAM with our paid plans as the IPv4 addresses are more expensive.

comments.author: rmoe
comments.body: Requires a monthly payment of $0.01it's not free

comments.author: VanwaTech
comments.body: Quote from: rmoe on January 06, 2023, 12:19:16 AMRequires a monthly payment of $0.01it's not freeThis is just to limit spam, if you post your account email I would be glad to credit your account.
